SELECT ? AS one FROM "follows" WHERE "follows"."account_id" = $? AND "follows"."target_account_id" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "mutes" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $? AND "mutes"."target_account_id" = $? AND "mutes"."hide_notifications" = $? LIMIT $?
SELECT ? AS one FROM "mutes" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $? AND "mutes"."target_account_id" = $? LIMIT $?
